  • Uses of Ship in ships

    Subclasses of Ship in ships
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  Barge
    The barge is a slower ship, but makes up for it with its cargo capacity
    class  Clipper
    The Clipper is the fastest ship, good for moving quickly between islands.
    class  TallShip
    The TallShip is a pretty average ship.
    class  WarShip
    The war ship is a combat ready ship, good at dealing with pirates.
    It has below-average speed, and comes pre-equipped with cannons, however its cargo hold is small, it's expensive to maintain, and it starts with little money
